__e: Had to die for me to get it.
I used to have the best street fighter in this city, now I don't.
Hate to break it to you, Billy, but you're not a street fighter anymore.
A prizefighter enters the ring. His brother asks the family priest to pray for him.
He was the best fighter I ever handled.
He's the best wrestler I ever saw.
Rocky ain't no more a fighter than his old man was.
I'm a better fighter than I ever was before... than you ever were.
As one would expect of the great Muten Roshi. Such magnificent skill!
I just asked myself where I'd go if I were a prize fighter and it would be a gymnasium.
You call him a killer. He's a professional fighter, not a killer.
He has a string on every fighter and manager in New York.
Well, if someday, somebody came up to you... it might even be a fighter, and acted like he'd seen you someplace before... you'd notice the same thing in him.
Hey, you sure are one hell of a fighter, brother.
